anya-e0903n2:3_2: sammāsambuddhena khandhavaggasaṁyutte paṭhamaṁ nakulapitusuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:4_1: bhaggesu bhante susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye nakulapitaraṁ gahapatiṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:4_2: Nakulapitā bhante gahapati bhagavantaṁ ‘‘ahamasmi bhante jiṇṇo vuḍḍho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto āturakāyo abhikkhaṇātaṅko,
anya-e0903n2:4_3: aniccadassāvī kho panāhaṁ bhante bhagavato manobhāvanīyānañca bhikkhūnaṁ,
anya-e0903n2:4_9: āturo hāyaṁ gahapati kāyo aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho,
anya-e0903n2:4_10: yo hi gahapati imaṁ kāyaṁ pariharanto muhuttampi ārogyaṁ paṭijāneyya,
anya-e0903n2:4_12: Tasmātiha te gahapati evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ ‘āturakāyassa me sato cittaṁ anāturaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
anya-e0903n2:6_0: Pucchā – tañcāvuso bhagavatā saṁkhittena bhāsitaṁ vitthārena kena kathañca vibhattaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:7_1: taṁ kho bhante bhagavatā saṁkhittena desitaṁ ‘‘kathañca gahapati āturakāyo ceva hoti āturacitto ca.
anya-e0903n2:7_2: Idha gahapati assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto,
anya-e0903n2:7_3: sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṁ attato samanupassati rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ,
anya-e0903n2:7_7: Tassa ‘‘ahaṁ rūpaṁ mama rūpa’’nti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
anya-e0903n2:7_8: Tassa rūpavipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā’’ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā
anya-e0903n2:9_1: tattheva āvuso dutiyavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhaka mahātherehi paṭhamaṁ saṁgītaṁ aniccasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:10_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘rūpaṁ bhikkhaveaniccaṁ,
anya-e0903n2:10_6: Evaṁ passaṁ bhikkhave sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati,
anya-e0903n2:12_0: Pucchā – dukkhaanattasuttāni panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitāni.
anya-e0903n2:13_1: sāvatthiyaṁyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘rūpaṁ bhikkhave dukkhaṁ,
anya-e0903n2:13_11: Evaṁ passaṁ bhikkhave sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati,
anya-e0903n2:13_22: nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānātī’’ti evaṁ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0903n2:15_0: Pucchā – bhārasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:16_1: sāvatthiyaṁyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘bhārañca vo bhikkhave desessāmi bhārahārañca bhārādānañca bhāranikkhepanañca,
anya-e0903n2:16_7: Ayaṁ vuccati bhikkhave bhāro’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:17_0: Bhārā have pañcakkhandhā, bhārahāro ca puggalo;
anya-e0903n2:19_0: Nikkhipitvā garuṁ bhāraṁ, aññaṁ bhāraṁ anādiya;
anya-e0903n2:22_0: Pucchā – na tumhākasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:23_1: sāvatthiyaṁyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhu ārabbha ‘‘yaṁ bhikkhave natumhākaṁ taṁ pajahatha,
anya-e0903n2:23_2: taṁ vo pahīnaṁ hitāya sukhāyabhavissatī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:25_0: Pucchā – anattalakkhaṇasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:26_1: bārāṇasiyaṁ bhante isipatane migadāye pañcavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘rūpaṁ bhikkhave anattā,
anya-e0903n2:26_4: labbhetha ca rūpe evaṁ me rūpaṁ hotu,
anya-e0903n2:26_5: evaṁ me rūpaṁ mā ahosī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:28_1: theravagge panāvuso tatiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ yamakasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:29_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ yamakattheraṁ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:29_2: Āyasmato bhante yamakattherassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ hoti ‘‘tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi,
anya-e0903n2:29_3: yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati,
anya-e0903n2:29_5: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘taṁ kiṁ maññasi āvuso yamaka,
anya-e0903n2:29_6: rūpaṁ niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā’’ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:30_1: kathañcāvuso tattha āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati āyasmato yamakattherassa paṭividdhasaccassa
anya-e0903n2:30_2: diṭṭhisampannassa anuyogavattajhāpanavasena paṭipucchitvā uttari dhammadesanaṁ vitthārena desesi.
anya-e0903n2:31_5: ‘No hetaṁ āvuso’ti evamādinā bhante āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati āyasmato yamakattherassa anuyogavattajhāpanavasena
anya-e0903n2:32_0: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi āvuso yamaka, rūpaṁ, vedanaṁ, saññaṁ, saṅkhāre,
anya-e0903n2:34_2: sammāsambuddhena khandhavaggasaṁyutte theravagge pañcamaṁ vakkalisuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:35_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṁ vakkaliṁ theraṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:35_2: Āyasmā bhante vakkalithero ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘cirapaṭikāhaṁ bhante bhagavantaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamitukāmo,
anya-e0903n2:35_3: natthi ca me kāyasmiṁ tāvatikā balamattā,
anya-e0903n2:35_14: rūpaṁ niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā’’ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:36_0: ‘‘Ahaṁ vakkali, kiṁ te iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena’’ –
anya-e0903n2:37_0: ‘‘Taṁ kiṁ maññasi vakkali, rūpaṁ niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā’’ –
anya-e0903n2:39_0: ‘‘Yaṁ panāniccaṁ, dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā’’–
anya-e0903n2:42_1: kathañcāvuso punapi bhagavā bhikkhū pesetvā āyasmato vakkalittherassa paggahavacanaṁ ārocāpesi.
anya-e0903n2:42_2: Sopi kathaṁ attano pavattiṁ bhagavato paccārocāpesi.
anya-e0903n2:43_1: suṇāvuso tvaṁ vakkali bhagavato vacanaṁ dvinnañca devatānaṁ,
anya-e0903n2:43_2: imaṁ āvuso rattiṁ dve devatāyo abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ gijjhakūṭaṁ obhāsetvā yena
anya-e0903n2:44_2: ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho āvuso ekā devatā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘vakkali bhante bhikkhu vimokkhāya cetetī’ti.
anya-e0903n2:44_3: Aparā devatā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘so hi nūna bhante suvimutto vimuccissatī’ti.
anya-e0903n2:44_4: Bhagavā ca taṁ āvuso vakkali evamāha ‘mā bhāyi vakkali,
anya-e0903n2:44_8: Evaṁ kho bhante bhagavā punapi bhikkhū pesetvā āyasmato vakkalittherassa paggahavacanaṁ ārocāpesi.
anya-e0903n2:44_9: Sopi bhante āyasmā tenahāvuso mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha ‘‘vakkali bhante bhikkhu ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno,
anya-e0903n2:44_15: natthi me tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṁvāti na vicikicchāmī’’ti evamādinā bhagavato attano pavattiṁ paccārocāpesi.
anya-e0903n2:44_16: So hi bhante āyasmā acirapakkantesu tesu bhikkhūsu satthaṁ āharitvā vedanaṁ vikkhambhetvā mūlakammaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0903n2:44_18: Evaṁ kho bhante tassa āyasmato abhisamparāyo ahosi.
anya-e0903n2:46_0: Pucchā – assajisuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:47_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṁ assajiṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:47_2: Āyasmā bhante assaji ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘pubbe khvāhaṁ bhante gelaññe
anya-e0903n2:47_5: Tassa mayhaṁ bhante taṁ samādhiṁ appaṭilabhato evaṁ hoti no cassāhaṁ parihāyāmī’’ti.
anya-e0903n2:47_6: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘ye te assaji samaṇabrāhmaṇā samādhisārakā samādhisāmaññā,
anya-e0903n2:47_7: tesaṁ taṁ samādhiṁ appaṭilabhataṁ evaṁ hoti ‘no cassu mayaṁ parihāyāmā’ti.
anya-e0903n2:47_9: rūpaṁ niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā’’ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:49_0: Pucchā – khemakasuttaṁ panāvuso kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:50_1: kosambiyaṁ bhante sambahule there bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā khemakattherena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:50_2: Sambahulā bhante therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dāsakaṁ pesetvā catukkhattuṁ āyasmantaṁ khemakaṁ ābādhikaṁ
anya-e0903n2:50_4: tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘pañcime āvuso upādānakkhandhā vuttā bhagavatā.
anya-e0903n2:50_7: imesu khvāhaṁ āvuso pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu na kiñci attaṁ vā attaniyaṁ vā samanupassāmī’’ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā khemakattherena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:51_1: kathañcāvuso tattha āyasmā khemako uttari dhammadesanaṁ pavaḍḍhetvā vitthārena therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ desesi.
anya-e0903n2:51_2: Kīdiso ca nesaṁ dhammadesakadhammappaṭiggāhakānaṁ dhammadesanāya ānisaṁso adhigato.
anya-e0903n2:52_1: catutthe bhante vāre āyasmā khemako ‘‘alaṁ āvuso dāsaka kiṁ imāya sandhāvanikāya,
anya-e0903n2:52_3: ahameva therānaṁ santikaṁ gamissāmī’’ti daṇḍamolubbha āyasmā khemako yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0903n2:52_4: upasaṅkamitvā therehi bhikkhūhi pucchito ‘‘nakhvāhaṁ āvuso rūpaṁ asmīti vadāmi,
anya-e0903n2:52_6: Na khvāhaṁ āvuso vedanaṁ asmīti vadāmi,
anya-e0903n2:52_7: napi aññatra vedanā asmīti vadāmī’’ti evamādinā bhante āyasmā khemako uttaripi dhammadesanaṁ pavaḍḍhetvā vitthārena desesi.
anya-e0903n2:52_8: Imasmiñca pana bhante veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṁ therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṁsu āyasmatoca khemakassa.
anya-e0903n2:52_9: Evaṁ kho bhante tesaṁ therānaṁ dhammadesakadhammappaṭiggāhakānaṁ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0903n2:54_0: Pucchā – channasuttaṁ panāvuso kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:55_1: kosambiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ channattheraṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:55_2: Āyasmā bhante channatthero āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca ‘‘ovadatu maṁ āyasmā ānando,
anya-e0903n2:55_4: karotu me āyasmā ānando dhammiṁ kathaṁ,
anya-e0903n2:55_6: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘sammukhā me taṁ āvuso channa bhagavato sutaṁ,
anya-e0903n2:55_8: dvayanissito khvāyaṁ kaccāna loko yebhuyyena atthitañceva natthitañca,
anya-e0903n2:55_9: lokasamudayaṁ kho kaccāna yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato yā loke natthitā,
anya-e0903n2:55_10: sā na hotī’’ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:56_0: Ovadatu maṁ āyasmā ānando, anusāsatu maṁ āyasmā ānando.
anya-e0903n2:58_2: sammāsambuddhena khandhavaggasaṁyutte pupphavagge pupphasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:59_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘nāhaṁ bhikkhave lokena vivadāmi,
anya-e0903n2:59_3: na bhikkhave dhammavādī kenaci lokasmiṁ vivadati,
anya-e0903n2:59_4: yaṁ bhikkhave natthi sammataṁ loke paṇḍitānaṁ,
anya-e0903n2:61_0: Na bhikkhave dhammavādī kenaci lokasmiṁ vivadati.
anya-e0903n2:63_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pheṇapiṇḍūpamasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:64_1: ayujjhāyaṁ bhante gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘seyyathāpi bhikkhave ayaṁ gaṅgā nadī mahantaṁ pheṇapiṇḍaṁ āvaheyya,
anya-e0903n2:64_2: tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso passeyya nijjhāyeyya yoniso upaparikkheyya,
anya-e0903n2:64_3: tassa taṁ passato nijjhāyato yoniso upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyeyya,
anya-e0903n2:64_7: Evameva kho bhikkhave yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁvā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ
anya-e0903n2:64_8: vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
anya-e0903n2:64_9: taṁ bhikkhu passati nijjhāyati yoniso upaparikkhati,
anya-e0903n2:64_10: tassa taṁ passato nijjhāyato yoniso upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyati,
anya-e0903n2:64_13: kiñhi siyā bhikkhave rūpe sāro’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:69_0: Rittakaṁ tucchakaṁ hoti, yo naṁ passati yoniso.
anya-e0903n2:71_0: Pahānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ dhammānaṁ, rūpaṁ passatha chaḍḍitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:72_0: Āyu usmāca viññāṇaṁ, yadā kāyaṁ jahantimaṁ;
anya-e0903n2:75_0: Vadhako esa akkhāto, sāro ettha na vijjati.
anya-e0903n2:77_0: Divā vā yadi vā rattiṁ, sampajāno paṭissato.
anya-e0903n2:81_1: tattheva āvuso dhammakathikavagge dutiyadhammakathikasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:82_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:82_2: Aññatamo bhante bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘dhammakathiko dhammakathikoti bhante vuccati,
anya-e0903n2:82_3: kittāvatā nu kho bhante dhammakathiko hoti,
anya-e0903n2:82_6: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘rūpassa ce bhikkhu nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya dhammaṁ deseti,
anya-e0903n2:82_7: ‘dhammakathiko bhikkhū’ti alaṁ vacanāyā’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:84_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi saṁgītaṁ sīlavantasuttañca sutavantasuttañca kattha
anya-e0903n2:84_2: kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:85_1: bārāṇasiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ mahākoṭṭhikaṁ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:85_2: Āyasmā bhante mahākoṭṭhiko sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0903n2:85_3: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca ‘‘sīlavatāvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasikātabbā.
anya-e0903n2:85_4: Sutāvatāvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasikātabbā’’ti.
anya-e0903n2:85_6: sutāvatāvuso koṭṭhika bhikkhunā pañcupādānakkhandhā aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato
anya-e0903n2:85_7: parato palokato suññato anattato yoniso manasikātabbā’’ti evamādinā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:88_1: rādhasaṁyutte panāvuso dutiyaṁ sattasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:89_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ rādhattheraṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:89_2: Āyasmā bhante rādhatthero bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘satto sattoti bhante vuccati,
anya-e0903n2:89_3: kittāvatā nu kho bhante sattoti vuccatī’’ti.
anya-e0903n2:89_4: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘rūpe kho rādha yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā,
anya-e0903n2:89_6: tasmā sattoti vuccatī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:92_1: diṭṭhisaṁyutte panāvuso tatiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ soattā suttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:93_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘kismiṁ nu kho bhikkhave sati kiṁ upādāya kiṁ abhinivissa
anya-e0903n2:93_2: evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati so attā so loko so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’’ti evamādinā
anya-e0903n2:95_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṁ natthidinnasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:96_1: sāvatthiyaṁyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘kismiṁ nu kho bhikkhave sati kiṁ upādāya kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati natthi dinnaṁ,
anya-e0903n2:96_4: natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṁ kammānaṁ phalaṁ vipāko’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:99_1: okkantasaṁyutte panāvuso paṭhamaṁ cakkhusuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:100_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘cakkhuṁ bhikkhave aniccaṁ vipariṇāmi aññathābhāvi. Sotaṁ. Ghānaṁ. Jivhaṁ. Kāyo.
anya-e0903n2:100_2: Mano anicco vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:103_1: sāriputtasaṁyutte panāvuso dasamaṁ sucimukhīsuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:104_1: rājagahe bhante sucimukhiṁ paribbājikaṁ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:104_2: Sucimukhī bhante paribbājikā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca ‘‘kiṁ nu kho samaṇa adhomukho bhuñjasī’’ti.
anya-e0903n2:104_3: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘na khvāhaṁ bhagini adhomukho bhuñjāmī’’ti evamādinā paṭikkhipitvā ‘‘ye hi
anya-e0903n2:104_4: keci bhagini samaṇabrāhmaṇā vatthuvijjā tiracchānavijjāya micchājīvena jīvikaṁ kappenti,
anya-e0903n2:104_5: ime vuccanti bhagini samaṇabrāhmaṇā adhomukhā bhuñjantī’’ti evamādinā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:105_0: Kiṁ nu kho samaṇa adho mukho bhuñjasi.
